Container.Name: ozwdaemon
Container.Overview:
Container for running the OpenZWave MQTT Adapter (for Home Assistant via the new Z-Wave Integration)
You will need a running MQTT instance and a z-wave controller in order to use this container.
For more information see: https://github.com/OpenZWave/qt-openzwave https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/ozw/
Or visit the unraid forum support thread for more configuration/info
Container.Description:
Container for running the OpenZWave MQTT Adapter (for Home Assistant via the new Z-Wave Integration)
You will need a running MQTT instance and a z-wave controller in order to use this container.
For more information see: https://github.com/OpenZWave/qt-openzwave https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/ozw/

Config.Name: MQTT Host
Config.Description: IP Address of the MQTT Host

Config.Name: USB Path
Config.Description: Path to the USB stick/serial device for your z-wave controller in the container. This should be the same value as USB Z-Wave Device.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Port used to access the web-based ozw-admin instance in the container (when using allinone image)

Config.Name: USB Z-Wave Device
Config.Description: USB stick/serial device passthrough (your z-wave controller)

Config.Name: MQTT Port
Config.Description: The port to access the MQTT Host on. Defaults to 1883

Config.Name: Zwave Network Key
Config.Description: Network key for the Z-Wave network. Not required if no devices are securely included.

Config.Name: ozw-admin Port
Config.Description: Port used by ozw-admin GUI to access the instance
